```{r}
#exploring repoRter.nih

data("nih_fields") 
fields <- nih_fields %>%
  filter(response_name %in% #specify the headers you want
    c("appl_id", "subproject_id", "activity_code", "project_title", "fiscal_year",
  "award_amount", "is_active", "project_start_date", "abstract_text", "org_names", "organization_dept_type")) %>% pull(include_name)

req <- make_req(criteria = list(fiscal_years = 2018:2021,
                                include_active_projects = TRUE,
                                org_names = c("Stanford", "New Haven")
                                ),
                include_fields = fields, limit = 50, message = FALSE)

res <- get_nih_data(query = req,
max_pages = 1, flatten_result=TRUE)
```
